pre_caption: From an eye-level perspective inside a car, the shot provides a close-up of the interior in the foreground and a wide view of a tunnel outside. The car's dashboard occupies the bottom of the frame, with the left A-pillar running diagonally along the left edge. An overhead console is visible at the top center. The camera moves forward with the car, causing the tunnel walls in the middle ground, seen through the windshield and left window, to rush backward with significant motion blur. In the background, the distant end of the tunnel remains centered in the frame, appearing to grow closer as the car advances. Reflections from the tunnel's lights continuously sweep across the glass surfaces from right to left.
